metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20536 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a heap-based buffer over-read at liblas::SpatialReference::GetGTIF() (spatialreference.cpp) in libLAS 1.8.1 that will cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: liblas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
